title: 【學生宿舍】112學年第一學期電費、扣罰彙整明細公告 【Student Dormitory】 Announcement of Billing Verification for the Fall Semester , 2023-2024 Academic Year
author: 陳怡秀
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 學務處生活輔導組 - 陳怡秀 - yishoue@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6212
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【學生宿舍】112學年第一學期電費、扣罰彙整明細公告 【Student Dormitory】 Announcement of Billing Verification for the Fall Semester , 2023-2024 Academic Year
日期： Wed, 21 Feb 2024 09:35:59 +0800
附檔： 住宿保證金複查表Student_Dormitory_Accommodation_Guarantee_Application_Form0925.pdf (141 KB)   
各位住宿生大家好： 1、112學年第一學期電費計費期程共四階： (1) 第一階段: 2023/09/06 - 2023/10/02 (2) 第二階段: 2023/10/02 - 2023/10/31 (3) 第三階段: 2023/11/01 - 2023/11/30 (4) 第四階段: 2023/12/01 - 2024/01/15 2、宿舍個人使用電費和扣罰請自行上網查詢。https://sys.ndhu.edu.tw/SA/DormStudent/Login.aspx 如對電費和扣罰金額有疑慮，請於2024/2/28(三)前申請複查，請填寫「電費、扣罰複查申請表」如附件，經宿舍管理員確認後辦理，如未按時提出或提出後查證無誤，將仍依本公佈結果辦理。 3、上下學期應繳電費和扣罰於學年度住宿結束後結算，從該學年度之住宿保證金扣抵，保證金扣抵後結餘退還住宿生，若有不足者，另行通知補繳。 業務承辦人：陳助理，03-8906212 學務處生活輔導組關心您~ Dear dormitory residents, 1、 The electricity charges of Student Dormitory are calculated by 4 periods (1) 1st Period: 2023/09/06 - 2023/10/02 (2) 2nd Period: 2023/10/02 - 2023/10/31 (3) 3rd Period: 2023/11/01 - 2023/11/30 (4) 4th Period: 2023/12/01 - 2024/01/15 2、Please check your bill and dormitory inspection deduction information on-line. https://sys.ndhu.edu.tw/SA/DormStudent/Login.aspx If you have any questions regarding the calculations and dormitory inspection deduction, please fill in the form of deposit reassessment and seek reconfirmation from the dorm manager before handing it in to the Office of Student Affairs and Life Division no later than 2024/2/28(Wed). 3、The charge amount is calculated at the end of the each semester, and deducted from your deposit. Only if your deposit is not enough for the deduction, will you need to pay the balance. For more information, please contact: Mr. Chuang at 03-8906217 Student Living Services Division Office of Student Affairs
